tr_s89Title:
ЗАДАНИЕ ДЛЯ ВСТРЕЧИ
«НАША ХРИСТИАНСКАЯ ЖИЗНЬ И СЛУЖЕНИЕ»
tr_s89DescFooter: Примечание для учащегося: Материал для этого задания и номер урока указаны в рабочей тетради «Жизнь и служение». Воспользуйся руководством к своему заданию из «Указаний для встречи "Наша христианская жизнь и служение" (S-38).
tr_noMMeeting: На этой неделе нет встречи в будние дни
tr_publicWitnessing: Обучение для служения в общественных местах
tr_lcNoAssignedVariations: Чего достигла наша организация|Обращение Руководящего совета
tr_cbsLffWithPointsVariations: lff урок {{ lesson }} пункты {{ points }}|lff урок {{ lesson }} пункт {{ points }}
tr_noWMeetingWeek: На этой неделе нет встречи на выходных
tr_exportMidweekMeetinDesc: Выбери расписания и формы, которые хочешь экспортировать, и выбери предпочитаемый шаблон. Organized сохранит твой выбор шаблона на следующий раз, чтобы упростить экспорт.
tr_applicationAPSDesc: Because of my love for Jehovah and my desire to help others to learn about him and his loving purposes, I would like to increase my share in the field service by enrolling as an auxiliary pioneer for the period indicated below:
tr_continuousAPS: I desire to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: I am of good moral standing and habits. I have made plans that will enable me to meet the hour requirement.—See the June 2013 Our Kingdom Ministry, p. 2.
tr_noteAPSApplication: NOTE: If possible, please submit this application at least a week before you desire to begin your auxilary pioneer service. This application is not to be sent to the branch office but, rather, will be kept by the congregation for its files.
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
Attention Congregation Service committee:

1. Is the applicant a good example in Christian living, being of good moral character?

2. Persons reproved or reinstated during the past year or those who still have restrictions on them do not qualify.

3. Have you consulted with the appropriate group overseer?
tr_approvingAPSApplication: To be approved by service committee members:
tr_moreInformationForAP: Хочешь служить общим пионером? Подай заявку на hub.jw.org или свяжись со старейшинами твоего собрания.
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: Service committee of your congregation will review it and if it’s approved, elders will notify you
tr_continuousAP: I wish to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_monthsPendingAP: You have already submitted the auxiliary pioneer application for the following months: {{ months }}. You can apply for future months at any time.
tr_monthsApprovedAP: You have been approved to serve as an auxiliary pioneer during the following months: {{ months }}. You can apply for future months at any time.
